page.title: 18 CLIFTON - BUSINESSES
page.content: Boulderdyke Farm is a large poultry farm called {TADMARTON POULTRY} employing about 140 people. Chickens are reared at 24 farms in local villages including one at Lower Aynho Grounds which has 15,000 hens. At Clifton, 60,000 eggs are hatched out each week. Day old chicks are sold to the farms for 18p each and when fattened for slaughter, sell for 55p/kg The main breeds used are Cobb and Ross. The business started in 1909. {SOLAR DESIGNS} employs 46 people. They make gold and silver bracelets for ladies. They send them to jewellers all over the U.K. and abroad. The business is 9yrs old and situated in the old church. Ity is a relatively large jewellery manufacturer as most employ only a few people. The business, which is expanding will shortly be moving to Deddington,but will keep Clifton Church
